articles.title: At Asian Games, India fearlessly won medals against the might of superpowers - The Indian Express
articles.description: Defending their strongholds in hockey and kabaddi was important, but the medals in table tennis and badminton in world-class fields point to real progress
articles.content: By winning 107 medals at the Hangzhou Asian Games, India for the first time entered the elite sporting club with a three-digit tally that has China, Japan and Korea as its regular members. Of course,… [+2478 chars]
